subject: Golf
British Open (Golf)
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Johnson, who missed an eagle for the win at Chambers Bay and then a birdie that would have forced a playoff, said he is confident he will come back stronger at St. Andrews.
snippet: Johnson, who missed an eagle for the win at Chambers Bay and then a birdie that would have forced a playoff, said he is confident he will come back stronger at St. Andrews.
